about_the_game:
This mashup brings together the action of Samurai Warriors and the fighting entertainment of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round!

This set contains all 30 Samurai Warriors Mashup Costumes.

Content included:
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Kasumi & Oichi
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ayane & Nene
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Marie Rose & Gracia
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Honoka & Kunoichi
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Nyotengu & Nouhime
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Kokoro & Okuni
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Hitomi & Protagonist
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Momiji & Ina
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Helena & Aya
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Leifang & Lady Hayakawa
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Tina & Koshosho
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Phase 4 & Ranmaru Mori
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Mila & Ginchiyo Tachibana
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Lisa & Yoshitsugu Otani
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Rachel & Kai
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Christie & Masamune Date
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Alpha‐152 & Oichi (Mystery Officer)
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa & Hanzo Hattori
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Hayate & Yukimura Sanada
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ein & Mitsunari Ishida
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Raidou & Yoshihiro Shimazu
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Jann Lee & Naomasa Ii
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Zack & Keiji Maeda
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Bayman & Tadakatsu Honda
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Bass & Ieyasu Tokugawa
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Brad Wong & Ujiyasu Hojo
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Eliot & Hanbei Takenaka
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Rig & Masanori Fukushima
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Gen Fu & Shingen Takeda
- DOA5LR SW Mashup - Leon & Kenshin Uesugi

*The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.
*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

This mashup brings together the action of Samurai Warriors and the fighting entertainment of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round! This set contains all 30 Samurai Warriors Mashup Costumes. Content included: - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Kasumi & Oichi - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ayane & Nene - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Marie Rose & Gracia - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Honoka & Kunoichi - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Nyotengu & Nouhime - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Kokoro & Okuni - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Hitomi & Protagonist - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Momiji & Ina - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Helena & Aya - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Leifang & Lady Hayakawa - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Tina & Koshosho - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Phase 4 & Ranmaru Mori - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Mila & Ginchiyo Tachibana - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Lisa & Yoshitsugu Otani - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Rachel & Kai - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Christie & Masamune Date - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Alpha‐152 & Oichi (Mystery Officer) - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa & Hanzo Hattori - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Hayate & Yukimura Sanada - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Ein & Mitsunari Ishida - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Raidou & Yoshihiro Shimazu - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Jann Lee & Naomasa Ii - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Zack & Keiji Maeda - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Bayman & Tadakatsu Honda - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Bass & Ieyasu Tokugawa - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Brad Wong & Ujiyasu Hojo - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Eliot & Hanbei Takenaka - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Rig & Masanori Fukushima - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Gen Fu & Shingen Takeda - DOA5LR SW Mashup - Leon & Kenshin Uesugi *The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

name: Samurai Warriors Mashup Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.

short_description: This set contains all the Samurai Warriors Mashup costumes. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters except Akira, Jacky, Pai, Sarah, and Naotora Ii. *The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
